mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.cover, c.lesson_num AS lessonNum, CONVERT ( c.price, DECIMAL ( 8, 2 ) ) AS price, ecd.description, et.`name` AS teacherName, es1.title AS levelOne, es2.title AS levelTwo FROM edu_course c LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON c.id = ecd.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_teacher et ON c.teacher_id = et.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es1 ON c.subject_parent_id = es1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es2 ON c.subject_id = es2.id WHERE c.id = #{courseId}
